metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9063 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An integer overflow during the parsing of XML using the Expat library. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 50.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9063` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 50.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-globalmenu - 50.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-mozsymbols - 50.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-testsuite - 50.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '50.0+build2-0ubuntu0.16.04.2').
